-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{"from":"10:00", "till":"11:00"}'

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/users/book-appointment \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_JWT_TOKEN" \
  -d '{
    "stylistId": "STYLIST_OBJECT_ID",
    "serviceId": "SERVICE_OBJECT_ID",
    "subServiceId": "SUBSERVICE_OBJECT_ID",  // optional, remove if not needed
    "date": "2024-06-10",
    "slot": { "from": "10:00", "till": "11:00" },
    "notes": "Please be on time"
  }'
